title: In the green race, auto companies hop on powertrains
description: Indian carmakers are adapting to a mix of powertrain technologies, including petrol, hybrids, and electric, to meet policy initiatives and changing preferences. The market demands diverse options for cleaner and sustainable transport solutions, driving competition and innovation.
